pages.text: Alloys are created in the $(machines/alloy_furnace)Alloy Furnace$() and the $(machines/induction_furnace)Induction Furnace$(). See JEI for alloy recipes. Listed in this entry are the common uses for each alloy.
Made in: AF / IF  $(br2)Used for pewter tools.
Made in: AF / IF  $(br2)Used for bronze tools.
Made in: AF / IF  $(br2)Used for decoration.
Made in: AF / IF  $(br2)Used for decoration and machinery.
